Text: Is this the US or JAP version?
Great, works perfect or better.  This is a great FPS for PSP.  Maybe the only FPS.  Needs a 256M card.  Thanks for the up.

Works perfectly as stated. Make sure you put the COA_GAME directory on the root of the memory stick.  Also the rest goes in the psp/game directory.  Requires any umd.  I used Ridge Racer with firmware 1.5.
